name: MTLSharedEventListener
desc: A listener for shareable event notifications.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new shareable event listener.

items.name: init(dispatchQueue: DispatchQueue)
items.desc: Creates a new shareable event listener with a specific dispatch queue.

items.name: var dispatchQueue: DispatchQueue
items.desc: The dispatch queue used to dispatch any notifications.
